thread.section_title: Travel News & Deals - Los Angeles Times
thread.title: Delta puts St. Louis on sale for $220 round trip from LAX
thread.title_full: Delta puts St. Louis on sale for $220 round trip from LAX

author: Catharine Hamm
title: Delta puts St. Louis on sale for $220 round trip from LAX
text:
Delta puts St. Louis on sale for $220 round trip from LAX St. Louis Mark Cunningham / Getty Images 
St. Louis is a baseball town -- how well Dodgers fans know that -- and you can visit the home of the Cardinals (Busch Stadium is pictured above) for $229 round trip on Delta. 
St. Louis is a baseball town -- how well Dodgers fans know that -- and you can visit the home of the Cardinals (Busch Stadium is pictured above) for $229 round trip on Delta. (Mark Cunningham / Getty Images) By Catharine Hamm contact the reporter 
St. Louis, a city named for King Louis IX of France, can be visited without paying a kingâ€™s ransom: Delta offers a round-trip fare from LAX for $220, which includes all taxes and fees, through July, although subject to availability. 
The ticket must be purchased at least 14 days in advance, and holiday blackouts apply. 
Info: Delta , (800) 221-1212
